about_the_game:
The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing as it uses a high grip asphalt surface!

This track pack contains 4 new spectacular lay-outs starting with #WA3 and WA6 the oval course. The other 2 layouts will automatically come available in this pack as soon as they are released! These 4 new lay-outs are designed by the VRC team. #WA3 and #WA6 will even suit 1:10 and 1:8 nitro racing! Track #WA6 is a super fast 4-corner oval, a serious challenge for electric and nitro oval racers!
